creator: Futorum
descriptionHtml:
The watch face has a simple high-tech style design for the best display of information.
The unique feature of this watch face is a day and night world map, which is updated in real time. Your current location is also marked on this map.

Some of the functions of the watch face are available for free,
FULL functionality is available after purchasing a subscription.

This watch face is available on devices running Wear OS 2.4 and 3+ (API 28+), primarily the Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/5 & Google Pixel Watch.
Devises running Huawei Lite OS and Samsung Tizen NOT SUPPORTED.

The watch face shows digital time, date, battery level, sunrise or sunset time, moon phase, moonrise or moonset time, steps and distance traveled, heart rate, history of heart rate measurement and upcoming event.

Available in 7 color themes and 8 colors for the symbol of time.
There are two progress bars on the watch face - steps to the goal and battery level.

The watch face also displays additional digital time for the selected time zone. You can select the time zone in the watch face settings menu.

In the watch face settings, you can set the stride length according to your height. This will help for a more accurate calculation of the distance traveled.

The area containing alarm shortcut can be replaced with any app shortcut you like.
The upper area for complications is not filled by default. Customize it if necessary through the watch face menu.

🚩 IMPORTANT NOTES
• After installing the watch face, you need to install application shortcuts and complications widgets as you wish.
• This watch face independently measures your heart rate. This watch face does not receive data from stock Wear OS heart rate apps.
• All information about sunrise / sunset, moon age, moonrise / moonset, etc. is calculated by the watch face independently of stock apps.
• To calculating the sunrise / sunset, moonrise / moonset, displaying the day and night world map, etc. you need to enable the "Location" option on both the watch and the smartphone.

Functionality
✔ - available for free
💲 - available after a paid subscription

✅ DAY & NIGHT WORLD MAP
✔ Real-time updated world map showing the change of day and night
💲 Your location on the world map
✅ WORLD TIME
✔ Digital time (UTC)
✔ Time zone code and name
✔ Difference in hours from GMT
💲 Possibility to choose a time zone
✅ TIME & DATE
✔ Digital time (12h and 24h modes)
✔ Date, month, day of the week
💲 Day of the year, week of the year
✅ SUN & MOON
💲 Sunrise / sunset
💲 Moon phase
💲 Moonrise / moonset
✅ CUSTOMIZATION
💲 7 color themes
💲 8 colors of time symbols
💲 1 area for complication widget
💲 1 customizable app shortcut
✅ STEPS
✔ Steps count
✔ Progress of steps towards the goal
💲 Configurable goal of counting steps
💲 Ability to select an application to receive the number of steps
✅ MOVED DISTANCE
✔ Moved distance (km or miles)
💲 Configurable stride length depending on your height
✅ HEART RATE
✔ Heart rate BPM
✔ Color-coded heart rate indicator (low, normal, high)
💲 Automatic heart rate measurement
💲 History of heart rate measurements
✅ MISC
✔ Battery level
✔ Upcoming event
✔ Unread notification count
✔ Handling system icons
✔ Multilingual (supports more than 40 languages)

➡ We are in social media
• Telegram - https://t.me/futorum
• Instagram - https://instagram.com/futorum
• Facebook - https://facebook.com/FutorumWatchFaces
• YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/c/FutorumWatchFaces

✉ If you have any questions, please contact us by e-mail support@futorum.com
We will be happy to assist you!

descriptionShort: Unique digital watch face with lots of information.
title: Futorum H6 Digital watch face

creator: Futorum
descriptionHtml:
The watch face has a simple high-tech style design for the best display of information.
The unique feature of this watch face is a day and night world map, which is updated in real time. Your current location is also marked on this map.

Full functionality is available after purchasing a subscription.
1. You can subscribe in the watch face settings menu.
To open the menu make a long tap in the center of the screen, then tap on the settings icon at the bottom of the screen.
Click the "Subscribe" button, then after clicking on the "Subscribe" button, on the linked smartphone, in the notification line, you will be prompted to subscribe.
Open it and follow the Google Play instructions.
2. You can also subscribe in the companion app.

This watch face is available on devices running Wear OS 2.4 and 3+ (API 28+), primarily the Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/5/6 & Google Pixel Watch/2.
Devises running Huawei Lite OS and Samsung Tizen NOT SUPPORTED.

The watch face shows digital time, date, battery level, sunrise or sunset time, moon phase, moonrise or moonset time, steps and distance traveled, heart rate, history of heart rate measurement and upcoming event.

🚩 IMPORTANT NOTES

• All information about sunrise / sunset, moon age, moonrise / moonset, etc. is calculated by the watch face independently of stock apps.
